3f2e2531201cfbf853f16f668132eaf2 (14:38): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: If you have two battery-powered devices, use one to recharge the other, and then alternate when the first one is about to run out
3f2e2531201cfbf853f16f668132eaf2 (14:38): It's a bit of a pain but it'll keep you going forever
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (14:40): 3f2e2531201cfbf853f16f668132eaf2: It'll only go on forever assuming 100% efficiency and no other power use

3f2e2531201cfbf853f16f668132eaf2 (14:41): a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554: I'm sure I've heard of stickers you can put on batteries that make them last longer, so you should be able to exceed 100% efficiency that way
3f2e2531201cfbf853f16f668132eaf2 (14:43): http://tech.slashdot.org/article.pl?sid=05/01/28/0319239 - it was on Slashdot so it must be true
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (14:43): Title: Slashdot | Nanotech Brings Battery Life Extender for Mobiles (at tech.slashdot.org)
